lead_paragraph: The Nets acquired David Wesley from the New Orleans Hornets for Bernard Robinson, Mile Ilic and cash. The Nets plan to waive Wesley, General Manager Ed Stefanski said. Stefanski said the move was made for roster flexibility. The team has 13 players, and Stefanski said the Nets had no immediate plans to fill out the roster.
